user_instruction: 'Tell Jane to send out this month'"'"'s company newsletter to me (employees@quantuminnovations.com). Instruct her to consult her Gmail and Notion for the necessary information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Request to Send Out This Month’s Company Newsletter

Hi Jane,

Could you please send this month’s company newsletter to employees@quantuminnovations.com at your earliest convenience? You can find all the necessary content and updates in your Gmail and our Notion workspace.

Thank you very much!

Best regards,  
[Your Name]
